description: Scores how deliberate and effective the compositional framing of a cat photograph feels. Evaluates subject placement and balance, spatial harmony between the cat and its environment, and compositional flow toward the subject. Higher scores indicate photographs that feel composed around the cat rather than merely containing one.

input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for intentional framing â€” whether the composition feels deliberate and positions the cat as the natural focal point of the image.
